item.title: Working Guthans?
item.dc:creator: @zoro35 zoro35
item.description:
@zoro35 wrote:

Well how you get Guthans to heal you as much as you hit? And I think it has something to do with this if Im not mistaken ;D

    public boolean FullGuthanEquipped() {
        if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4724
                && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4728
                && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4730
                && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4726) {
            return true;
        }
        return false;			
    }
